page.title: 04Buxted Chicken Farm_Boreham
page.content: We went to{Buxted Chicken Factory,} Boreham,and met Bill Jefferies.We saw all the chickens being unloaded from the truck and being put onto a revolving rack.They went behind the truck and when they came round they were unconscious.We then saw some slides which showed us a pool of electrified water called a water stunner.It showed us the chickens throats being cut and there was a lot of{blood.}If the machine didn't cut the throats a man would do them. The feathers were taken off in a tank at a {180}degs.They were cleaned in Chlorine water.Then all their insides were taken out and necks and feet were pulled off.They were weighed and wrapped.There are{190}workers and it was opened in{1961.}Buxted are the largest chicken producers in Britain. They pack 100 per min.& 6000 an hour.
